summary: This bill, H.R. 3636, aims to improve the Department of Defense's process for verifying the licenses of healthcare professionals working within the military. It mandates the Secretary of Defense to establish a centralized system for verifying licensure, ensuring that commanding officers of healthcare facilities can quickly confirm the credentials of their medical staff regardless of their location or branch of service. The bill specifies a target of completing at least 90% of license verifications within seven days.
